attributes.action: Stop British Telecom charging customers for non direct debit payments.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
British Telecom are going to charge people because they don't pay by direct debit. A lot of people don't have bank accounts or don't trust banks so they will be forced to pay the outragious new charge. BT make enough profit as it is without ripping off the poor and needy.A phone line is a necessity nowadays, not a luxury.
The government must step in and stop this from happening.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
